title: India extends operation of imported coal-based power plants until Oct 15
description: India has extended a mandate for imported coal-based power plants to operate at full capacity until October 15, in response to anticipated high demand for electricity during the summer months. The directive, revealed in a government order, applies to companies like Tata Power and Adani Power, operating plants with a combined capacity of nearly 16 gigawatts.
